definition[0]: if an object sees the light of day, it is taken from the place where it has been hidden, and becomes publicly known
example[0]: Some of these documents will probably never see the light of day.
definition[1]: if a law, decision etc sees the light of day, it comes into existence for the first time
definition[2]: if something sees the light of day, it is brought out so that people can see it
example[1]: This decision will ensure that the Pentagon Papers never see the light of day.
example[2]: This type of PC first saw the light of day in 1981.
